Package de.rumford.tradingsystem

Class VolatilityDifference

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.rumford.tradingsystem.Rule
      • de.rumford.tradingsystem.VolatilityDifference
  • public class VolatilityDifference
extends Rule
    The VolatilityDifference is a Rule providing forecasts based on historic and recent volatility of the base value.

    Historically, times of higher volatility in a asset tended to be accompanied by falls in course value. This rule exploits this behavior by comparing the current volatility of an asset with its historic counterpart.

    Author:
    Max Rumford

        public static void validateLookbackWindow​(int lookbackWindow)
        Validates the given lookback window. The lookback window must be greater than or equal to 1.
        Parameters:
